snippet: Michael French, who struggled with the brain disease frontotemporal dementia, diagnosed in 2007, died at a Manhattan nursing home.
abstract: Michael French, whose struggles with brain disease frontotemporal dementia were chronicled in 2012 New York Times article and video, has died in Manhattan nursing home at age 73.
lead_paragraph: Michael French, who struggled with the brain disease frontotemporal dementia, diagnosed in 2007, died at a Manhattan nursing home.

headline.main: Michael French, Who Battled a Rare Dementia, Dies at 73
headline.print_headline: One Mind’s Long Decay Finally Ends
